title: America's forgotten nuclear migration: The Marshallese face new challenges in US
description: In the past several decades, thousands of Micronesian migrants displaced by the grim conditions in the bomb testing aftermath have been arriving in the United States.

title: Michigan AG announces charges against 'fake electors' in 2020 election plot
description: The Michigan attorney general has announced charges against the state's 16 "fake electors" for their alleged role in the scheme after the 2020 presidential election.

title: Home searched in Tupac Shakur murder investigation: Source
description: Police searched a home in the Las Vegas area on Monday night in the long-dormant murder case of Tupac Shakur, according to a law enforcement source.

title: Alaska volcano's week-long eruption spews another massive ash cloud
description: An ongoing eruption of a remote volcano in Alaska’s Aleutian Islands produced an ash cloud so large Tuesday warnings were sent to pilots about potentially dangerous conditions

title: No Labels group has 'steep climb,' but third party 'worth trying': Larry Hogan
description: No Labels co-chair Larry Hogan spoke to ABC News’ Linsey Davis about the group’s policy positions and addressed criticism about a potential third-party candidate.

title: Actors' union, studios squabble over which side to blame as strike enters 5th day
description: As the strike by SAG-AFTRA went into its fifth day Tuesday, the studios and producers accused the union of mischaracterizing the labor negotiations.

title: Small plane crashes into home in fiery, fatal accident
description: A small plane crashed into a home in Santa Fe, New Mexico, on Tuesday, resulting in an unspecified number of fatalities.

title: New warning issued for rebooking air travel after delays, cancellations
description: Experts weigh in on what to do after a flight is delayed or canceled and you need to rebook amid telephone scams.

title: House to vote on resolution saying Israel isn't a 'racist or apartheid state'
description: The controversy over Rep. Jayapal's comments will continue Tuesday as the House votes on a resolution to reaffirm Israel is not a racist state and condemn antisemitism.

title: 1-year-old girl accidentally shot and killed by 3-year-old sibling, authorities say
description: The shooting occurred at a home in San Diego County, California, on Monday.

title: Amid tensions with North Korea, US nuclear-capable submarine arrives in South Korea
description: The USS Kentucky made a rare stop in Busan on Tuesday, marking the first time a nuclear ballistic missile submarine visited South Korea since 1981.

title: What it means to be intersex and why controversial surgeries are still allowed
description: Despite many gender-affirming care bans for trans youth across the U.S., controversial surgeries for intersex children to assign them a gender are often still allowed.

title: Special counsel informs Trump he is target in 2020 election probe
description: Special counsel Jack Smith has informed former President Trump that he is a target in his investigation into efforts to overturn the 2020 election, say sources.

title: DeSantis becomes first major party candidate to enter South Carolina primary
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis filed paperwork on Tuesday for South Carolina’s 2024 presidential primary

title: Why police arrested suspected Gilgo Beach killer away from his house
description: More than 200 firearms were found at the home of the suspect in the Gilgo Beach murders, officials said.

title: WATCH:  Mansion built on top of apartment building in India
description: An incredible mansion has been constructed on top of a tower in the Indian city of Bangalore.

title: US national in North Korean custody after crossing DMZ line, UN says
description: The U.S. national had been on an orientation tour near the DMZ, the U.N. said.

title: Woman finds man hiding under coat in backseat of her car while driving home
description: A woman was left shaken and terrified by the side of a highway when she found a man hiding in the backseat of her car as she was driving “with a coat over his head.”

title: Deaths of 4 women now linked, DA says
description: A month after Portland officials warned the public about speculating against a serial killer, they are now saying a series of recent slayings are connected.

title: Everything to know for the next Powerball drawing as jackpot hits $1 billion
description: An estimated $1 billion jackpot is up for grabs in the next Powerball drawing.

title: South Korea searches for missing people as death toll from downpours reaches 41
description: Rescuers are searching for nine people still missing in landslides and other incidents caused by a week of torrential rains in South Korea

title: Belarus arrests a prominent journalist in continued crackdown on dissent
description: Authorities in Belarus have arrested a prominent journalist working with the U.S.-funded Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty, the latest step in a yearslong crackdown on opposition figures, independent journalists and human rights activists

title: Israeli protesters set for 'day of disruption' against Netanyahu's judicial overhaul
description: Israeli protesters have blocked highways and gathered outside Tel Aviv’s stock exchange and military headquarters in the latest countrywide demonstration against Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s planned judicial overhaul

title: Mystery object washed up on the Australian coast could be space junk, officials say
description: Authorities are investigating whether a cylindrical object about the size of a small car that washed up on a remote Australian beach is space junk from a foreign rocket

title: Birmingham firefighter dies days after getting shot at fire station: Mayor
description: One of the firefighters who was shot inside a Birmingham, Alabama, fire station on Wednesday has died, according to Birmingham's mayor.

title: Oregon's Cannon Beach reopens after cougar sighting on iconic coastal rock led to closure
description: Oregon's popular Cannon Beach has reopened after closing because of a cougar sighting on Haystack Rock

title: White House lawn turns to playground for kids' soccer clinic
description: Children donning jerseys of their favorite Major League Soccer teams joined first lady Jill Biden and players from FC Cincinnati, DC United, Chicago Fire and other teams for a youth soccer clinic on the White House South Lawn

title: US Coast Guard offloads over $158 million in cocaine and marijuana in San Diego
description: More than 11,600 pounds of cocaine and 5,500 pounds of marijuana were confiscated during counternarcotics patrols in the Eastern Pacific Ocean between May and June.

title: No injuries as jetliner's evacuation slide falls in Chicago neighborhood near O'Hare, officials say
description: Authorities say an emergency evacuation slide fell from an airliner and landed in the backyard of a home near Chicago's O’Hare International Airport on Monday

title: Florida family accused of selling fake COVID-19 cure through online church goes on trial in Miami
description: A Florida family accused of selling a toxic industrial bleach as a fake COVID-19 cure through their online church is on trial this week in Miami

title: Bison gores tourist in Yellowstone National Park
description: A woman was hospitalized after she was gored by a bison in Yellowstone National Park, park officials said.
